setup_instructions.config: after updating pushover below, rename file to config (no extension)
setup_instructions.timezone: update timezone information below to matching TZ database name; https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones.
setup_instructions.pushover: visit https://pushover.net to setup account; there is a one-time $5 purchase required; update application_token and user_token information below; if you would like additional argmuents outlined in https://pushover.net/api, add the additional arguments below.
setup_instructions.email: uses smtp to send plaintext emails, update the items below; if using 2fa, will likely need to use an app password. the process for gmail can be found here: https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/185833?hl=en
setup_instructions.mysql: update the mysql information below; note this setup presumes that a mysql database with appropriate permissions has been setup already
